targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_score" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "service_type", "namespace" fill(null)

SELECT (sum("value") * -1) FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_bandwidth" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" =~ /bytes_sent|sent/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype","namespace" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_response_time" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype", "namespace", "type" fill(null)

SELECT sum(value) FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_response_codes" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype","namespace", "type" fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_log_http_method" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "servicetype","namespace", "type" fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_beanstalkd_tubes" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" =~ /^current.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace", "tube", "type" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_beanstalkd_tubes" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'total_jobs' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace", "type", "tube", "host" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_approximate_data_size" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_pending_syncs" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_avg_latency" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_avg_latency" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)

SELECT max("value") FROM "[[DS]]"."openio_zookeeper_zk_outstanding_requests" WHERE "namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[ds_int]]), "namespace" fill(null)
